connectionSpecification.title: Iceberg V2 Destination Specification
connectionSpecification.description: Defines the configurations required to connect to an Iceberg catalog, including warehouse location, main branch name, and catalog type specifics.

access_key_id.description: The AWS Access Key ID with permissions for S3 and Glue operations.
access_key_id.title: AWS Access Key ID

secret_access_key.description: The AWS Secret Access Key paired with the Access Key ID for AWS authentication.
secret_access_key.title: AWS Secret Access Key

s3_bucket_name.description: The name of the S3 bucket that will host the Iceberg data.
s3_bucket_name.title: S3 Bucket Name

s3_bucket_region.description: The region of the S3 bucket. See here for all region codes.
s3_bucket_region.title: S3 Bucket Region

s3_endpoint.description: Your S3 endpoint url. Read more here
s3_endpoint.title: S3 Endpoint

warehouse_location.description: The root location of the data warehouse used by the Iceberg catalog. Typically includes a bucket name and path within that bucket. Must include the storage protocol (such as "s3://" for Amazon S3).
warehouse_location.title: Warehouse Location

main_branch_name.description: The primary or default branch name in the catalog. Most query engines will use "main" by default. See Iceberg documentation for more information.
main_branch_name.title: Main Branch Name

oneOf.title: Nessie Catalog
oneOf.description: Configuration details for connecting to a Nessie-based Iceberg catalog.

server_uri.description: The base URL of the Nessie server used to connect to the Nessie catalog.
server_uri.title: Nessie Server URI

access_token.description: Optional token for authentication with the Nessie server.
access_token.title: Nessie Access Token

namespace.description:
The Nessie namespace to be used in the Table identifier. 
            |This will ONLY be used if the `Destination Namespace` setting for the connection is set to
            | `Destination-defined` or `Source-defined`
namespace.title: Namespace

oneOf.title: Glue Catalog
oneOf.description: Configuration details for connecting to an AWS Glue-based Iceberg catalog.

glue_id.description: The AWS Account ID associated with the Glue service used by the Iceberg catalog.
glue_id.title: AWS Account ID

database_name.description: The Glue database name. This will ONLY be used if the `Destination Namespace` setting for the connection is set to `Destination-defined` or `Source-defined`
database_name.title: Database Name

oneOf.title: Rest Catalog
oneOf.description: Configuration details for connecting to a REST catalog.

server_uri.description: The base URL of the Rest server used to connect to the Rest catalog.
server_uri.title: Rest Server URI

namespace.description:
The namespace to be used in the Table identifier. 
                |This will ONLY be used if the `Destination Namespace` setting for the connection is set to
                | `Destination-defined` or `Source-defined`
namespace.title: Namespace

catalog_type.description: Specifies the type of Iceberg catalog (e.g., NESSIE, GLUE, REST) and its associated configuration.
catalog_type.title: Catalog Type
